name: Excel2GED

screenshots.caption: Help Tab with Schema Extension Information.
Main Tab Data Input Area & GEDCOM Creating Macro Button

short_description:
Excel genealogy spreadsheet with macro for converting data to gedcom format. Unlike other similar Excel2gedcom converters, family relationships are preserved .GEDCOM generation is initiated with a push of a VBA coded macro button. Spreadsheet protection password = "x2g"

Current bug shows all children under last spouse. If you find this to be the case, for now, enter only one partner and fix the problem in your genealogy software. For a man with multiple wives having children with each, enter the first wife as attached to the husband and the second as being initially single until you get into your genealogy program then attach them to the husband. You can also have multiple instances of the same man or woman and merge them later on with the program where you import the gedcom. My apologies for the inconvenience.

There is another Excel file based program which may be superior in this regard (and others as it is a more substantial item), which is also free. It's called cvbFT.
summary: Excel genealogy sprdsht w/ macro for converting data to gedcom format.
